The Byblos mobile app has lots of features where we can view our private and joint accounts, transfer between them, make payments like cards, loans and tuition for USEK and NDU. We can check the portfolios with their details. We can even transfer to another Byblos Bank account (all we have to do is add a beneficiary and then do an instant transfer). 
In the main page, we even have access to AkramApp.

With byblos app, every byblos customer is a staff, anyone could easily manage their accounts, apply for loans and cards, check statements and even transfer money between accounts, it is a great feature especially when transferring from deposit to current ATM account. THUMBS UP.
A great app that provides a great service! Each update carries a lot of improvements 👍 Keep going "only if the app can keep the transaction I've made, they fade away after a month or two"
Nice to see a Lebanese bank that has a great mobile banking application. Design and features are great! Definitely the best app in Lebanon for banking.
